meta-review.comment: Lightyear Frontier is a charming and relaxing farming and crafting game that offers a refreshing take on the genre. With its sci-fi setting, nature-focused gameplay, and gorgeous visuals, it provides a steady and engaging experience. While some may find the lack of conflict or survival elements a drawback, the game's well-defined roadmap for updates promises an exceptional gaming experience. The multiplayer function also allows for a fun cooperative experience with friends. Lightyear Frontier is definitely worth checking out for those seeking a peaceful yet compelling gaming experience.
